name: SEAMLESS_S_FUNC_UNIFORM_MCU
steps: Step 1.: Check iucode_tool in the host, otherwise should install it into the host.
Step 2.: Record the dmesg info before late loading process.
Step 3.: Load the proper patch into the intel-ucode folder.
Step 4.: Trigger the late loading process.
Step 5.: Check the updated information for microcode processing.
summary: Verify if microcode could be updated successfully, it is an uniform MCU in lieu of legacy late loading process.
